Name: Air Fryer 5QT Nonstick Grey 4-in-1 Cooker Dehydrate Roast
Description: Experience the ultimate in crispy cooking with the Ninja Air Fryer Pro, featuring Air Crisp Technology that surrounds your favorite foods with superheated air for hot, crispy results at temperatures of up to 400F. With a large 5 QT capacity, you can cook up to 4 lbs of French fries and other crispy treats using little to no oil, making it easy to enjoy your favorite guilt-free snacks. This versatile air fryer offers four cooking functions, including Air Fry, Roast, Reheat, and Dehydrate, allowing you to satisfy any craving, from crispy appetizers and snacks to full meals, all with minimal oil and maximum flavor. Additionally, the nonstick basket and crisper plate make cleanup a breeze, so you can focus on cooking and enjoying your favorite dishes, crispy and healthy, every time.
Short description:
AIR CRISP TECHNOLOGY: 400℉ superheated air surrounds food for hot, crispy results with little to no oil.
 LARGE CAPACITY: The 5-QT nonstick basket and crisper plate fit up to 4 lbs of French fries or 5 lbs of chicken wings.
 4-in-1 FUNCTIONALITY: Air Fry, Roast, Reheat, and Dehydrate.
 GUILT-FREE FRIED FOODS: Up to 75% less fat than traditional air frying methods. Tested against hand-cut, deep-fried French fries.
 FROZEN TO CRISPY: Cook frozen foods in just minutes for an extra-crispy finish.
 SPACE SAVER: Ninja’s latest air fryer design allows you to save even more space on your countertop without compromising capacity.
 EASY TO CLEAN: The basket and crisper plate are both nonstick for easy cleaning.
 WHAT’S INCLUDED: Air Fryer, 5-QT nonstick basket and crisper plate, chef-inspired 20 recipe book and cooking charts.

Name: Digital Air Fryer 4 Quart Medium Size Oven Cooker
Description: Experience the ultimate in healthy frying with the Oster 4 Quart Digital Air Fryer, a versatile kitchen appliance that uses up to 99.5% less oil than traditional deep fryers to deliver crispy, fried food results with minimal guilt. With 10 pre-set digital functions, including bake, dehydrate, and reheat, you can effortlessly prepare a wide range of delicious meals, from succulent chicken wings and tender fish to golden french fries and mouth-watering desserts. The air fryer's viewing window and interior cooking chamber light provide optimal visibility, allowing you to monitor your food as it cooks, while the durable, non-stick coating ensures easy food release and hassle-free cleaning. Featuring a 60-minute timer with an audible ready alert, this air fryer takes the guesswork out of cooking, and its modern, matte black exterior with chrome accents makes a stylish addition to any kitchen. Perfect for health-conscious home cooks and busy families alike, the Oster 4 Quart Digital Air Fryer is a must-have kitchen essential for effortless, oil-free cooking every day.
Short description:
10-Preset Digital Functions: Bake, chicken wings, dehydrate, dessert, fish, french fries, meat, reheat, whole chicken, and vegetables, for easily making all of your favorite meals.
 Removable Viewing Window: Lets you monitor cooking process, and removes for easy cleaning.
 Sleek, Modern Design: Matte black exterior with chrome accents and easy-to-clean digital screen.
 Healthier Cooking: Get the delicious, crispy results you love, with up to 99.5% less oil than traditional deep fryers.
 Durable Nonstick Surface: Scratch-resistant finish won't flake or peel and ensures that food won't stick.
 Interior Cooking Chamber Light: Offers enhanced visibility while monitoring cooking progress.
 60-Minute Timer: With audible "ready" alert to let you know when food is done.

Name: Portable Air Fryer 4QT Glass Cooker Oven Bakeware Set

Featuring a 6-cup and 4-QT TempWare container, this versatile cooking system allows for effortless preparation of single-serve meals in just 7 minutes, perfect for busy individuals on-the-go. The Ninja Crispi is also ideal for sharing crispy snacks with friends and family or serving larger crowds, making it an essential addition to any kitchen or outdoor gathering. With the innovative TempWare glassware, you can effortlessly transition from frozen to crispy in minutes, streamlining your cooking process and delivering delicious results every time.

 CRISPI POWERPOD: The power of a full-sized air fryer now in the palm of your hand.

CRISPI CONTAINER ADAPTER: Includes an adapter so the Crispi PowerPod can be used on the larger container.
EASY TO CLEAN: Containers, crisper plates, adapter and lids are dishwasher safe.

Name: Air Fryer 4-in-1 Oven Roast Bake Dehydrate 4QT Compact
Description: Experience the power of speedy meal prep with the Ninja Air Fryer, a revolutionary kitchen appliance that cooks your favorite foods up to 50% faster than traditional ovens, making it a game-changer for busy families. This innovative air fryer ensures a crispy, golden finish on your meals every time, thanks to its advanced smart processor that automatically adjusts fan speeds for optimal hot air circulation, allowing for effortless cooking of a variety of dishes, from crispy 2 lbs. of French fries to roasted vegetables, all with minimal oil required. The generous 4-quart ceramic-coated basket accommodates family-sized portions, while the wide temperature range enables versatile cooking functions, including air frying, baking, roasting, reheating, and dehydrating, making it an essential addition to your kitchen countertop for quick and easy meal solutions. With its rapid cooking capabilities and little to no oil needed, the Ninja Air Fryer is perfect for health-conscious home cooks seeking a convenient and delicious way to prepare meals and snacks for the whole family.

Name: Ninja Foodi 8Qt 6-in-1 Air Fryer Dual Zone Grey

This groundbreaking air fryer boasts two independent baskets, allowing you to cook multiple meals at once, eliminating the need for back-to-back cooking sessions. The Smart Finish feature of the Dual Zone Technology intelligently manages cooking times, ensuring that both foods are perfectly cooked and ready to serve at the same time, making meal prep a breeze and revolutionizing the way you use your air fryer.

2 INDEPENDENT BASKETS: The original Air Fryer with 2 independent baskets, the XL air fryer lets you cook 2 foods, 2 ways, at the same time, eliminating back-to-back cooking like a traditional single-basket air fryer.

 SEPARATE HEATING ZONES: 2 independent 4-quart zones have their own cooking baskets, cyclonic fans, and rapid heaters.
 EASY CLEANING: Easy-to-clean baskets and dishwasher-safe crisper plates.
 LESS FAT: Up to 75% less fat than traditional air frying methods. Tested against hand-cut, deep-fried French fries.
WIDE TEMPERATURE RANGE: 105°F to 450°F allows you to gently remove moisture from foods or quickly cook and crisp foods with convection heat.
WHAT'S INCLUDED: DualZone Air Fryer, (2) 4 Quart Baskets, (2) Nonstick Crisper Plates, 15 Recipes, Additional Meal Options & Cooking Charts.
Cord Length: 32"

This innovative kitchen essential boasts dual 5.5-quart zones that function like two mini ovens, enabling simultaneous cooking of multiple dishes at the same temperature, or utilizing the Match and Sync Function to cook two distinct foods in different ways, ensuring both are ready at the same time. The addition of a glass window provides real-time monitoring of your dishes as they cook, while the modular design features a removable partition, transforming the dual air fryer ovens into a spacious 11-quart single oven, ideal for roasting a whole chicken. Short description:
2 FOODS, 2 WAYS, AT THE SAME TIME: Eliminating back-to-back cooking like a traditional single-basket air fryer with 2 independent XL air fryer baskets. SMART COOK SYSTEM: Achieve the perfect doneness, from rare to well-done, at the touch of a button with the integrated Foodi Smart Thermometer—no guesswork required.
 DUALZONE TECHNOLOGY: The Smart Finish feature, unlocks cooking 2 foods 2 ways that finish at the same time, or the Match Cook feature, easily copies settings across zones for full 10-qt. capacity 6 VERSATILE COOKING PROGRAMS: Air Fry, Air Broil, Roast, Bake, Reheat, and Dehydrate.

CAPACITY AND 2 BASKETS: Cook a main and a side at the same time for quick, large family meals, or cook up to 8 -lbs. of chicken wings with ease.
 2 INDEPENDENT 5-QT. XL ZONES: They have their own cooking baskets, cyclonic fans, and rapid heaters. FASTER COOKING: Cooks two 6-lb. chickens up to 30% faster than a traditional oven. Frozen-to-crispy meals in 30 minutes. Wide temperature range, from: 105°F–450°F. EASY TO CLEAN: Includes nonstick cooking baskets and dishwasher-safe crisper plates.

Name: Ninja 12-in-1 Double Oven Air Fryer Toaster Convection Oven Stainless Steel
Description: Experience the ultimate in cooking flexibility with the Ninja Double Oven, a revolutionary countertop oven that combines the power of two ovens in one compact space, perfect for home cooks and busy families seeking to elevate their meal prep and cooking experience. With its innovative FlexDoor design, this dual oven allows for simultaneous cooking of two meals at different temperatures and cooking times, making it ideal for cooking a variety of dishes, from quick snacks and sides to larger roasts and air fried meals. The Top Rapid Oven is perfect for speedy meals, such as sheet pan dinners and snacks, while the Bottom Convection & Air Fry Oven is designed for larger, more complex dishes, including up to 6 lbs of crispy air fried wings. For added convenience, Smart Finish technology enables synchronization of both ovens to cook a full course meal that finishes at the same time, streamlining dinner preparation and reducing cooking time by up to 65% compared to traditional ovens. Additionally, FlavorSeal technology prevents flavor crossover between the two oven cavities, ensuring that each dish retains its unique taste and aroma. With 12 cooking functions at your disposal, including convection baking, air frying, and roasting, this countertop dual oven offers unparalleled versatility and convenience, making it an essential addition to any kitchen.
Short description:
FLEXDOOR: Creates two separate ovens. Access just the top for quick meals and snacks, or open the full door so you can cook 2 meals, 2 ways on the top and bottom.
 FLAVORSEAL TECHNOLOGY: Two separate ovens prevents smells from crossing between ovens, so your flavors stay separate.
 SMART FINISH TECHNOLOGY: Sync both independent ovens to cook 2 meals, 2 different ways that finish at the same time.
 FASTER MEAL-MAKING: Spend less time cooking and more time with family. Eliminate back-to-back cooking for 65% faster meal-making than your traditional oven.
 12 COOKING FUNCTIONS: Bake, broil, reheat, keep warm, bagel, and toast in the Top Rapid Oven. Air fry, convection bake, pizza, air roast, whole roast, and dehydrate in the Bottom Convection & Air Fry Oven.
 FAMILY SIZED CAPACITY: Ninja’s Double Oven fits 6 lbs of wings and a 12 in pizza at the same time to feed up to 8 people.
 EASY FAMILY DINNERS: Two independent ovens let you cook a meal for the kids and a separate meal for the parents at the same time.
 WHAT'S INCLUDED: Countertop oven, 2 sheet pans, 2 wire racks, air fry basket, removable crumb tray, and chef-created recipe book with 15 recipes and cooking charts.

 COMPLETE MEALS THAT COOK IN 15 MINS: Cook your proteins, veggies, and pasta or grains all at the same time and make a meal 50% faster than in a wall oven.
 ONE STOP SHOP IN YOUR KITCHEN: With its all-in-one functionality and included accessories, the Ninja Combi is the only appliance you will ever need—no more cluttered countertops and endless piles of dishes to clean afterward.

 FROZEN TO TABLE IN UNDER 30 MINUTES: No need to defrost—super-heated steam will quickly thaw frozen ingredients and cook them to a safe temperature in under 30 minutes.

Name: Dual Air Fryer with Digital Touch Control and Double Basket
Description: Experience the ultimate in family mealtime convenience with the Chefman TurboFry Touch Dual Air Fryer, designed to cook double the dishes with double the flavor, perfect for large crowds and families. The two spacious 4.5-quart nonstick baskets provide ample space for cooking a variety of main dishes and sides to crispy perfection, with the added convenience of synced baskets and a handy finish-time feature.  AUTO REMINDERS: For the best results, most foods benefit from a shake about halfway through cooking. That’s why this air fryer features a visual and audio SHAKE reminder.
 CARE-FREE CLEANUP: A nonstick interior and bonus basket liners prevent foods from sticking, which makes cleanup a breeze. Plus, the baskets and racks are top-rack dishwasher-safe.

 WHAT’S INCLUDED: Air Fryer, 5-QT nonstick basket and crisper plate, chef-inspired 20 recipe book and cooking charts.

Name: Ninja Foodi 8Qt 6-in-1 Air Fryer Oven DualZone Dehydrator Grill
Description: Experience the ultimate in air frying versatility with the Ninja Foodi 6-in-1 8-qt. 2-Basket Air Fryer, featuring revolutionary Dual Zone Technology that enables simultaneous cooking of two different foods in its two independent baskets, allowing for a significant reduction in cooking time compared to traditional single-basket air fryers. With its innovative Smart Finish feature, this cutting-edge air fryer intelligently manages the cooking process to ensure that both foods are perfectly cooked and ready to serve at the same time, making meal preparation faster and more convenient than ever.
Short description:
2 INDEPENDENT BASKETS: The original Air Fryer with 2 independent baskets, the XL air fryer lets you cook 2 foods, 2 ways, at the same time, eliminating back-to-back cooking like a traditional single-basket air fryer.
 SMART FINISH & MATCH COOK: DualZone Technology allows you to choose between the Smart Finish feature, which unlocks cooking 2 foods 2 ways that finish at the same time, and the and a Match Cook button to easily copy settings across zones for full 8-qt capacity.
 6-IN-1 FUNCTIONALITY: Includes 6 versatile cooking programs: Air Fry, Air Broil, Roast, Bake, Reheat, and Dehydrate. The baskets can be washed in the dishwasher or by hand.
 XL CAPACITY: The 8-quart air fryer capacity lets you fit mains and sides at the same time for making quick family meals, or up to 4 lbs. of French fries or chicken wings.
 SEPARATE HEATING ZONES: 2 independent 4-quart zones have their own cooking baskets, cyclonic fans, and rapid heaters.
 EASY CLEANING: Easy-to-clean baskets and dishwasher-safe crisper plates.
 LESS FAT: Up to 75% less fat than traditional air frying methods. Tested against hand-cut, deep-fried French fries.
WIDE TEMPERATURE RANGE: 105°F to 450°F allows you to gently remove moisture from foods or quickly cook and crisp foods with convection heat.
WHAT'S INCLUDED: DualZone Air Fryer, (2) 4 Quart Baskets, (2) Nonstick Crisper Plates, 15 Recipes, Additional Meal Options & Cooking Charts.
Cord Length: 32"

Name: Stainless Steel Air Fryer Oven 8.5Qt Capacity Convection Bake
Description: Experience the ultimate in cooking versatility with the Elite Gourmet 8.5 Quart Air Fryer Oven, featuring a sleek stainless-steel finish and advanced adjustable timer and temperature controls. With 5 versatile functions, you can effortlessly air fry, broil, bake, roast, toast, and warm your favorite meals and snacks, all while enjoying healthier, oil-free cooking options. The air fryer oven's dynamic-hot air circulation technology ensures crispy exteriors and juicy, tender interiors, making it perfect for cooking a wide range of dishes, from moist and tasty treats to crunchy, healthy fried foods. Unlike traditional deep fryers, this innovative appliance uses little to no oil, reducing calories and fat intake, and is also more energy-efficient than conventional ovens, saving you time and money on your electric bill. The included accessories, such as the bake pan, air fry basket, and removable crumb tray, make cooking and cleaning a breeze, while the comprehensive instruction manual, complete with 25 delicious and healthy recipes, provides inspiration for limitless culinary creations, allowing you to cook with ease and confidence, and enjoy your favorite foods, guilt-free.
Short description:
COMPACT 8.5L CAPACITY: Designed for singles or small families, this air fryer oven offers a generous cooking space, ideal for faster, healthier, and splatter-free meal preparation.
 STYLISH STAINLESS STEEL DESIGN: A sleek stainless-steel finish with a glass door and an easy-grip handle combines elegance with practicality, while its compact size saves space and allows for convenient storage.
 VERATILE 5-in-1 FUNTIONALITY: Choose from Air Fry, Broil, Toast, Bake, or Broil with Convection for ultimate cooking flexibility. Adjustable temperature settings (200°–450°F) with high power convection fan and a 60-minute timer ensure precise cooking, with an auto shut-off feature for added safety.
 2 RACK SETTINGS: For versatility to easily prepare meats, fish, vegetables, pizza, and more. Enjoy air frying, roasting, broiling, and toasting your favorite dishes effortlessly.
 HEALTHY COOKING MADE EASY: Achieve crispy, delicious results with little to no oil, cutting out unnecessary calories without sacrificing flavor. Prepare your food & then simply set your function, temperature, and timer, and let the air fryer do the rest.
